body:
OK, i figured it out..

The line

fields: 'value'

needs to be in an array

fields: ['value']

   Ext.define('MyThing', {
        extend: 'Ext.panel.Panel',

        items: [{
            xtype: 'combo',
            store: {
                fields: ['value'],
                data: [
                        {value: 'ManagerX'},
                        {value: 'OwnerX'},
                        {value: 'FarmerX'},
                        {value: 'GovnerX'}
                    ]

            },
            displayField: 'value',
            valueField: 'value',
        }]
    })
title: Why are the combo elements not rendering?
